reviewText:
Hulkamania 2 (WF033)
04/22/86 Hulk Hogan & Hillbilly Jim vs. John Studd & King Kong Bundy
10/06/85 Hulk Hogan vs. King Kong Bundy
06/25/86 Hulk Hogan vs. Randy Savage
06/86 "The Flower Shop" with Hulk Hogan & Paul Orndorff
06/24/86 Hulk Hogan & Paul Orndorff vs. King Kong Bundy & John Studd (Orndorff turns on Hogan)
12/14/86 Hulk Hogan vs. Paul Orndorff (steel cage match)
08/17/85 Hulk Hogan vs. Brutus Beefcake
08/09/86 Hulk Hogan & George Steele vs. Randy Savage & Adrian Adonis
12/26/86 Hulk Hogan vs. Kamala
09/22/86 Hulk Machine, Super Machine, & Big Machine vs. John Studd, King Kong Bundy, & Bobby Heenan

This is an outstanding look at the career of Hulk Hogan. He tackles the likes of Bundy, Studd, Macho Man, Kamala, and others. Also includes the betrayal by Paul Orndorff and the cage match from SNME.
Hogan teams with the Machines in a match against the Heenan Family.
awesome tape and I highly recommend it!!!
